mapper.insert: insert into reply(reply_no, content, user_name, board_no) values(#{reply_no}, #{content}, #{user_name}, #{board_no})
mapper.update:
update reply
content=#{content},
user_name=#{user_name},
where reply_no=#{reply_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from reply where board_no = #{board_no}
